title: CADEX 36 disc road wheels use carbon fiber spokes for a massively stiff wheelset
content:
CADEX wheels added a 36mm deep option to its expanding arsenal, rounding out a high-end wheel line that can go toe to toe with the big guns. The CADEX brand emerged from Giant Bicycles to offer high-end wheels, saddles, and more for performance-oriented riders. The CADEX 36 Disc is right on the money for the [â€¦]

The post CADEX 36 disc road wheels use carbon fiber spokes for a massively stiff wheelset appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
